#summary Fast Scientific Code in GroovyLab with Groovy++

= Introduction =

'GroovyLab supports Groovy++. With Groovy++, computationally demanding parts can be executed with speed similar to Java/Scala. We provide some benchmarks adapted from:  https://github.com/alextkachman/'
